summary: An email from July 23, 2019, regarding inmate Jeffrey Epstein. The sender reports that after interviewing Epstein, they reviewed a staff log which noted Epstein had told staff his cellmate tried to kill him and he was trying to remember what happened. The sender was unable to follow up as Epstein was in legal meetings.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate who reported to staff that his cellmate tried to kill him and that he was trying to remember what happened.

events.title: Epstein reports cellmate attack
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein told staff watching him that his cellmate tried to kill him and that he was trying to remember what happened, as noted in a staff log.

keyFacts: On July 23, 2019, Jeffrey Epstein reported to staff that his cellmate had tried to kill him.
Epstein stated he was 'trying to remember what happened' regarding the alleged attack.
The information was discovered in a staff log after an initial interview with Epstein.
Epstein was in legal meetings for the afternoon, preventing immediate follow-up on the report.
